## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fae3cf718c8ba606df2606c3b40b5b5f8eda8508027cb91fa7fbe54384cb9760)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'react-native-survicate' @ 2.6.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
